data.title: Indiana Pacers Roster
data.meta_description: Indiana Pacers scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Danny Granger was selected as the #17 pick in the First Round of the 2005 NBA Draft by the Indiana Pacers. Danny Granger signed a multi-year contract with the Indiana Pacers on July 7, 2005. Danny Granger signed a multi-year extension with the Indiana Pacers on October 31, 2008.

Tyler Hansbrough was selected as the #13 pick in the First Round of the 2009 NBA Draft by the Indiana Pacers. Tyler Hansbrough signed a multi-year contract with the Indiana Pacers on July 6, 2009.

A.J. Price was selected as the #22 pick in the Second Round of the 2009 NBA Draft by the Indiana Pacers. A.J. Price signed a multi-year contract with the Indiana Pacers on September 3, 2009.

Draft Rights to Jeff Foster, the #21 pick in the First Round of the 1999 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Indiana Pacers from the Golden State Warriors on June 30, 1999. Jeff Foster signed a multi-year contract with the Indiana Pacers on July 13, 1999. Jeff Foster signed a multi-year extension with the Indiana Pacers on October 29, 2002. Jeff Foster signed a multi-year extension with the Indiana Pacers on October 8, 2008.

Draft Rights to Roy Hibbert, the #17 pick in the First Round of the 2008 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Indiana Pacers from the Toronto Raptors on July 9, 2008. Roy Hibbert signed a multi-year contract with the Indiana Pacers on July 15, 2008.

Draft Rights to Brandon Rush, the #13 pick in the First Round of the 2008 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Indiana Pacers from the Portland Trail Blazers on July 9, 2008. Brandon Rush signed a multi-year contract with the Indiana Pacers on July 15, 2008.

Mike Dunleavy was acquired in a trade by the Indiana Pacers from the Golden State Warriors on January 17, 2007.

T.J. Ford was acquired in a trade by the Indiana Pacers from the Toronto Raptors on July 9, 2008.

Josh McRoberts was acquired in a trade by the Indiana Pacers from the Portland Trail Blazers on July 9, 2008. Josh McRoberts re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Indiana Pacers on July 22, 2009.

Troy Murphy was acquired in a trade by the Indiana Pacers from the Golden State Warriors on January 17, 2007.
